name: QQ Xuanfeng
description: QQ Xuanfeng is a downloader. It's easy to use with fast download speed, less memory occupied and fresh interface. Meanwhile, it's featured with skin customization, offline downloading and others.

zh_CN.description: QQ旋风是一款互联网下载工具，它的下载速度快、占用内存少、界面清爽而且操作简单，同时它支持个性化换肤、离线下载等功能。
zh_CN.name: QQ旋风
